body:
### RMR Reports
A WordPress plugin currently a sidebar widget that displays the Ripper Chair Snow Report every 10 minutes to your WordPress sidebar. There are future plans to create more features such as lift status and grooming reports.

You must be using PHP 5.3.x or better.

### Authors and Contributors
* Derek Marcinyshyn [derek.marcinyshyn.com](http://derek.marcinyshyn.com)
* Ian Houghton [IHoughton@revelstokemountainresort.com](mailto:IHoughton@revelstokemountainresort.com)

### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact Derek if you are having issues.
name: RMR Snow Reports
tagline: RMR Reports is a WordPress plugins displaying weather, snow, grooming and lift status updates.
